background_description: A dark aquatic environment with numerous blurred, circular light reflections (bokeh effect) scattered throughout, suggesting either deep water with distant light sources or an aquarium setting. The background is predominantly dark blue-green to black.
explanation: The image clearly displays a school of light-colored Dwarf Cichlids swimming against a dark background. Their pale yellowish bodies and distinct black markings create a high contrast, making them stand out significantly from the environment. There is no visual evidence of camouflage.
